objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><linearGradient id='bgGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFB347'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFECB3'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='rightGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#F0F8FF'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E6E6FA'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='540' height='1080' fill='url(#bgGradient)'/><rect x='540' y='0' width='540' height='1080' fill='url(#rightGradient)'/><g opacity='0.2'><circle cx='120' cy='200' r='30' fill='#FFFFFF'/><circle cx='180' cy='260' r='20' fill='#FFFFFF'/><circle cx='80' cy='300' r='25' fill='#FFFFFF'/><circle cx='200' cy='150' r='15' fill='#FFFFFF'/><circle cx='450' cy='100' r='40' fill='#FFFFFF'/><circle cx='400' cy='500' r='30' fill='#FFFFFF'/><circle cx='150' cy='600' r='25' fill='#FFFFFF'/><circle cx='350' cy='800' r='35' fill='#FFFFFF'/><circle cx='200' cy='900' r='20' fill='#FFFFFF'/></g><g transform='translate(850, 150)' opacity='0.15'><line x1='0' y1='0' x2='60' y2='60' stroke='#FFB347' stroke-width='8'/><line x1='100' y1='0' x2='40' y2='60' stroke='#FFB347' stroke-width='8'/><line x1='50' y1='-10' x2='50' y2='70' stroke='#FFB347' stroke-width='8'/></g><g transform='translate(750, 950)' opacity='0.15'><line x1='0' y1='0' x2='60' y2='60' stroke='#FFB347' stroke-width='8'/><line x1='100' y1='0' x2='40' y2='60' stroke='#FFB347' stroke-width='8'/><line x1='50' y1='-10' x2='50' y2='70' stroke='#FFB347' stroke-width='8'/></g></svg>

objects.text:
• Vintage twin-bell design for classic charm
• No batteries needed - traditional mechanical
• Loud alarm system for reliable wake-ups

product_details.name: Classic Mini Twin-Bell Alarm Clock - Retro White Design
product_details.description:
• Vintage-inspired twin-bell design for classic charm
• Compact size perfect for bedside tables and desks
• Clear, easy-to-read analog display with bold numbers
• Stylish white finish that complements any decor
• Traditional mechanical operation - no batteries needed
• Loud twin-bell alarm system for reliable wake-ups
• Durable metal construction for long-lasting use
• Portable and lightweight design
• Perfect blend of retro style and practical functionality
• Ideal for light sleepers and heavy sleepers alike

banner_details:
This banner is a vibrant promotional design split into two visually contrasting halves. The left side features a bright warm gradient from orange to soft yellow, housing all textual and call-to-action elements. Text layers are stacked vertically in a hierarchy: the bold title banner (`heading_1`), highlighted offer (`heading_2`), a strong value proposition (`subheading`), followed by a bulleted product description (`description`), urgency-oriented tagline (`tagline`), pricing standout (`price`), and a vibrant CTA button (`cta_button` and `cta`). The right half has a cool blue to lavender gradient and showcases a high-resolution vintage-style alarm clock image (`product_image`). Subtle circular graphics and decorative clock illustrations enhance visual appeal.

**Color Palette:**
- Orange (#FFB347)
- Dark Brown (#663300)
- Bright Red-Orange (#FF4500)
- Soft Yellow (#FFECB3)
- Light Blue (#F0F8FF)
- Pale Lavender (#E6E6FA)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image features a classic white twin-bell alarm clock with a clean and minimalistic aesthetic. The dominant color is a crisp white (#FFFFFF), creating a neutral and fresh look. Subtle silver-gray shadows (#D3D3D3) give depth and softness, enhancing the clock's 3D effect. The black (#000000) clock hands and numerals provide bold contrast for high readability. Faint blue-gray accents (#B0C4DE) on the bells and handle add a cool tone that balances the monochrome palette. This color scheme can inspire an elegant ad banner with a clean white background, black text, and blue-gray accents to maintain sophistication and clarity.
